amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 926, relating to bringing the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau into the regular appropriations process.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 199 printed in House Report 115-297 to strike section 926 on page 590, relating to bringing the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau into the regular appropriations process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A163) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 226 (Roll no. 521).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A163) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 226 (Roll no. 521).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A163) offered by Mr. Ellison.
